title: Bug 13507LinkedPositionUI has a reference to SWT.COLORRED
description: LinkedPositionUI(ITextViewer, LinkedPositionManager) org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.text.link.LinkedPositionUI has a reference toSWT.COLORRED which will be unreadble if the user sets their background colourto Red.We will be adding a getErrorText colour to JFaceColours in build 20020411. Youmay want to use that.
